bug.author: FGeri
bug.summary: [BUG] Deprecated interpolation argument doesn't have an effect
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸ› Bug</denchmark-h>
Deprecated interpolation argument doesn't have an effect since self.resample gets overwritten right after it gets set by interpolation
kornia/kornia/augmentation/augmentation.py
Lines 612 to 616 in c77e62c
if interpolation is not None:
import warnings
warnings.warn("interpolation is deprecated. Please use resample instead.", category=DeprecationWarning)
self.resample = Resample.get(interpolation)
self.resample = Resample.get(resample)

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions, and happy coding day ğŸ˜
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/edgarriba>@edgarriba</denchmark-link> Safe to be closed. The deprecation warning has been removed in the current master.
